title: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
description: The Eyes of Tammy Faye is a 2021 American biographical drama film based on the 2000 documentary of the same name by Fenton Bailey and Randy Barbato. Directed by Michael Showalter and written by Abe Sylvia, the film depicts the history of controversial televangelists Tammy Faye Bakker and Jim Bakker, as portrayed by Jessica Chastain (who also produces the film) and Andrew Garfield. Cherry Jones and Vincent D'Onofrio also star.

imdbInfo.ratingReason: Rated PG-13 for sexual content and drug abuse

properties.productionCompany: Searchlight Pictures / Freckle Films / MWM Studios
